contentrichtext.text: {{Location map|Namibia|label=Roter Kamm|marksize=6|mark=Red_pog.svg|lat_dir=S|lat_deg=27| lat_min=45|lat_sec=57|lon_dir=E|lon_deg=16|lon_min=17|lon_sec=17|position=right|thumb|width=210|float=right|caption=Crater location in the Karas region of southern Namibia}} '''Roter Kamm''' is a [[meteorite]] [[impact crater|crater]], located within the Namibian section of the [[Namib Desert]] in the [[Karas Region]]. It is 2.5 km in diameter and is 130 meters (400 feet) deep. The age is estimated to be between 4 and 5 million years placing it in the [[Pliocene]].<ref>Lutz Hecht, Wolf Uwe Reimold, Sarah Sherlock, Roald Tagle, Christian Koeberl, Ralf-Thomas Schmitt. New impact-melt rock from the Roter Kamm impact structure, Namibia: Further constraints on impact age, melt rock chemistry, and projectile composition. Meteoritics & Planetary Science. Volume 43, Issue 7, pages 1201â€“1218, July 2008.</ref> The crater is exposed at the surface, but its original floor is covered by [[sand]] deposits at least 100 meters (300 feet) thick. Crater formed in the Precambrian granitic gneiss - Namaqua Metamorphic Complex overlaid with some younger sedimentary rocks.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.wondermondo.com/Countries/Af/Namibia/Karas/RoterKamm.htm|title=Roter Kamm crater|publisher=Wondermondo}}</ref> The meteor that hit it was approximately the size of an [[Sport utility vehicle|SUV]].<ref>{{cite Earth Impact DB | name = Roter Kamm| linkname = roter-kamm| accessdate = 2009-08-16}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:Roter Kamm crater.jpg|[[Landsat]] image of the Roter Kamm crater; screen capture from [[NASA World Wind]] Image:Roter Kamm crater x2.jpg|Oblique [[Landsat]] image of Roter Kamm crater draped over digital elevation model (x2 vertical exaggeration); screen capture from [[NASA World Wind]] Image:Roter Kamm, PIA00503 md.jpg|False color [[Space-Based Radar|space radar]] (SAR-C/X-SAR) image of Roter Kamm impact crater </gallery> {{coord|27|46|0|S|16|17|20|E|type:landmark_region:NA|display=title}} {{Impact cratering on Earth}} [[Category:Impact craters of Namibia]] [[Category:Pliocene]] [[Category:Geography of Karas Region]] {{regional-geology-stub}} {{Namibia-geo-stub}}
